Articles.Content:
I am working on a "art" project that will be posted later today (2 hours)

In the meantime, I wanted to wish the KSP community a happy Easter ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT: (and sorry for upside down picture)![j7XAZLe.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/j7XAZLe.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-05T00:45:46Z" title="04/05/2015 12:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 5, 2015</time> by Owen5595**
It's on 6 PM Saturday here in the US, but happy Easter anyways! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> It's on 6 PM Saturday here in the US, but happy Easter anyways! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Actually, I live in the US too, but since it is now Easter in other parts of the world, I'd figure I'd get the celebrations started early ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-04T23:34:27Z" title="04/04/2015 11:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 4, 2015</time> by Owen5595**
  
Forums-Glitchez

Images will be posted in a few

EDIT: Here they are, 100% Kerbal Easter eggs (created by me)

xD that's really good for easter I should of done that XD his happy smile is the best
Happy Easter to you too! I gotta go and hang with the gran parents now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). Eat a tasty dinner!
